subject: review: Debian 4.0 Etch is faster
body:
Hello,
There is an interesting review of various distros
http://www.insidesocal.com/click/2007/06/inconvenient_truths_pc_vs_mac.html

Already linked at http://wiki.debian.org/PressCoverage2007

Regards
Andre Felipe Machado
http://www.techforce.com.br
